plot_all_stations(infile, loc_col, ctry_col, lat_col, lng_col, clr='blue', as_cluster=True)¶

Plots all data points in the file.

Parameters:
  • infile – filepath to the data/a pandas dataframe
  • loc_col – name of the location column.
  • ctry_col – name of the country column.
  • lat_col – name of the latitude column.
  • lng_col – name of the longitude column.
  • clr – color of the markers.
  • as_cluster – boolean value - create the markers as a cluster or not.
Returns:

a list of markers if as_cluster is False and a MarkerCluster otherwise.
plot_condition(infile, condition, cnd_col, loc_col, ctry_col, lat_col, lng_col, clr='blue', as_cluster=False)¶

Plots all of the data points that meet the specified condition.

Parameters:
  • infile –
  • condition – condition of the entries (currently works best with strings).
  • cnd_col – name of the column to be evaluated.
  • loc_col –
  • ctry_col –
  • lat_col –
  • lng_col –
  • clr – color of the markers.
  • as_cluster – boolean value - create the markers as a cluster or not.
Returns:

a list of markers if as_cluster is False and a MarkerCluster otherwise.

plot_potential_errors(infile, loc_col, ctry_col, lat_col, lng_col, clr0='lightred', clr1='orange')¶

Plots all of the potentially incorrect location data points.

Parameters:
  • infile –
  • loc_col –
  • ctry_col –
  • lat_col –
  • lng_col –
  • clr0 – color of the markers for entries that do not fall within any country border.
  • clr1 – color of the markers for entries whose country does not match the country indicated by the shapefile and coordinates.
Returns:

a list of Marker objects.

  • index – index of the entry.
  • radius –
  • loc_col –
  • ctry_col –
  • lat_col –
  • lng_col –
  • clr0 – color of the given data point.
  • clr1 – color of the other points.
Returns:

all of the data points as Marker objects.

Plots all data points whose country does not match the country indicated by the coordinates and shapefile. Note: Given the differences in spelling, correct data points might still be plotted.

  • infile –
  • loc_col –
  • ctry_col –
  • lat_col –
  • lng_col –

the data points as Marker objects.
